MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the FK2 postcode area of Falkirk, affecting properties in Smiddy Brae and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 12.50pm. Our engineers have arrived and are investigating a blown fuse on the overhead line at Kerse Farm. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1.46pm on Thursday 14th January 2021
